statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:AWSLambda) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (a:AWSLambda) WHERE NOT (a)-[:STS_ASSUME_ROLE_ALLOW]->(:AWSPrincipal) WITH a LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (a) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
